job_details.degree_required: BS degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience required

jd: From: Karthik, Softcomsystems karthik@softcomsystems.com Reply to: karthik@softcomsystems.com .NET Senior Developer/Lead Newark, NJ Hybrid (3 days onsite) Note: Need only locals to NJ Interview Process: Initial Phone/Video interviews followed by an in person interview. JD: Qualifications · BS degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience required · 12+ years of current experience in Software Development · Experience with one or more object-oriented programming language, e.g. C#, .NET Core, SQL, etc. · Knowledge of database systems including Oracle and SQL Server · Strong PL\SQL or stored procedure experience · Strong analytical skills, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret business needs and translate them into application requirements · Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively and confidently communicate with users, team members, and management · Ability to develop effective internal/external working relationships with both business units and vendors · Familiarity with Microsoft Fabric Experience with the following would be a plus: · Microsoft Fabric experience is plus · Application Lifecycle Management techniques and concepts · Experience with investments or securities · Ability to work with Agile methodologies in a fast paced environment · Experience with one or more object-oriented programming language C# · Test Driven Development, Entity Framework, MVC · TFS/Bit bucket source control tool · Autosys job management experience · JIRA experience for Agile Projects · Continuous Integration Continuous Delivery (CICD) tools such as Jenkins and automated processes · API management software like Apigee or equivalent
